title: My pixel XL will not respond to hey Google or ok Google, unless charging. Been this way since ver 9
content: This issue has been ongoing for months. I've seen other post with this same issue closed and locked with no response. I've cleared data/cache and also updated to latest patch each time they come out.  Issue still persist. Really saddened by Google not caring enough to fix this feature.  Makes me never want to buy Google home automation equipment.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel
